title.narrative: VIOLENCE PREVENTION AND RESPONSE MECH.

description.narrative: By 2016, government strengthens prevention and response mechanisms to protect children from abuse and violence, which contributes to Data And Child Protection, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2016, Montenegro addresses disparities and gaps in access to quality social services for excluded and vulnerable boys, girls and families in line with UN standards

participating-org.narrative: TRUSTEES OF COLUMBIA UNIVERSITY IN THE CITY OF NEW YORK

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2016, government strengthens prevention and response mechanisms to protect children from abuse and violence

description.narrative: Government`s commitment to prevent violence against children translated into amendments of the Family Law, introducing a ban on corporal punishment, launching of multi-year campaign on protection of children from violence and development of the first national Strategy on Protection of Children from Violence (2017-2021). | Status:On-track | As-of Date:11/01/2017

title.narrative: Number of municipalities where community based mechanisms for protection of children, from violence, abuse and neglect (OMTs) adopt and apply internationally accepted standards of working practice
(NOT VALID after Dec 31 2017) Data on some forms of violence, exploitation and abuse of children are collected through routine administrative sources

baseline.value: Data collection on some forms of violence exist (SWIS) but needs to be emproved

target.value: 2016:Existing data collection system emproved by number of forms of violence added in the system SWIS

actual.value: 2016:Adding a number of forms of violence in the SWIS system is currentlyunderway and should be comleted in Q1 of 2017.

title.narrative: Interministerial mechanism that coordinates child protection from violence meets regularly and is attended by senior officials
Strategy on Protecting Children from Violence developed
